sentences.english: Your lifejacket is located under your seat or beneath your central arm rest.
sentences.chinese: 你的救生衣裝在座位下或者中央扶手下面。

sentences.english: The centralization and the decentralization in the old China competed and alternate mutually.
sentences.chinese: 舊中國中央集權與地方分權相互競爭，相互交替。

sentences.english: The reading room of the British Library, UK.
sentences.chinese: 大英圖書館中央閱讀室，倫敦。

sentences.english: Greater Khingan Range forestry group, the central government subsidy of $55%.
sentences.chinese: 對大興安嶺林業集團公司，中央財政補貼55%。

sentences.english: For all its troubles, it seems that the US is still the real Middle Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 儘管危機重重，美國似乎仍是真正的“中央王國”。

sentences.english: It took some time to develop a central money-marking business.
sentences.chinese: 這使得建立和發展中央貨幣制造業頗費了一些時間。

sentences.english: Remember to spend a day in Central Park watching a play by Shakespeare in the open air.
sentences.chinese: 記得花一天時間在中央公園露天看莎士比亞的戲劇。

sentences.english: A Buddhist temple stands proud in the middle of the city .
sentences.chinese: 一座佛寺傲然挺立在城市的中央。

sentences.english: Some believe there are concerns among the central government as well.
sentences.chinese: 有些人認爲中央政府也存在這樣的憂慮。

sentences.english: I parked in the lot at Central High.
sentences.chinese: 我把車停在了中央高中的停車場。

sentences.english: The axis of rotation and its support are part of the central pedestal.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉軸和它的支撐結構是中央操作檯的一部分。

sentences.english: is this, kind of, green glass line in the middle of the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 是一條在人行道中央的綠色線。

sentences.english: East, south, west and north, the four directions, the must be fixed according to a central position.
sentences.chinese: 東南西北，四個方向，必須有個中央位置才能確定。

sentences.english: Third, the law or regulation needs to be faithfully implemented by the central government.
sentences.chinese: 第三，該法律或法規必須由中央政府忠實地推行。

sentences.english: Use a lighter to burn a hole in the middle of each Scindapsus aureus leaf.
sentences.chinese: 把一盆綠蘿的葉子中央都用打火機燒一個洞。

sentences.english: Project is located in the former Central New Film Factory near North Third Ring Road area.
sentences.chinese: 項目選址在原中央新影廠靠近北三環的區域。

definition: the rear/far behind the front line
